text: I’ve been seeing on Instagram this morning that one Dallas HW was fired. I can only imagine it’s Cary, even though I like her. I don’t think they’d break up the pair of Brandi and Steph, definitely not Leeanne, and I can’t see them getting rid of Kameron (since she’s LL’s #1 ally for now) as much as I’d like that. D’Andra is another option but I don’t think they’d drop Mama Dee and she’s got a set S4 storyline taking over the business and potentially rekindling (or further going after) Leeanne. Thoughts?
title: Dive into anything
